summary: The adult siblings of the Fitzgerald family prepare for their estranged father to return home for Christmas for the first time since he walked out on his family 20 years ago.
cast: Kerry Bish√©|Edward Burns|Heather Burns|Marsha Dietlein|Caitlin FitzGerald|Anita Gillette|Tom Guiry|Ed Lauter|Michael McGlone|Nick Sandow|Noah Emmerich|Connie Britton|Joyce Van Patten|Dara Coleman|Brian d'Arcy James|Malachy McCourt|Daniella Pineda|Johnny Solo|Michele Harris|Kevin Kash|Kristopher Kling
title: The Fitzgerald Family Christmas
